import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Card, Row, Col, Form, Button, Tooltip } from 'react-bootstrap'; import prev from '../../../img/prev.png'; import next from '../../../img/next.png'; import styles from '../FormsBase.module.css'; const FormGroup = ({ label, children }) => ( {label} {children} ); const MarksCompletionForm = ({ studentData, generating_info }) => { const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(0); const nextStep = () => setCurrentStep((prevStep) => prevStep + 1); const prevStep = () => setCurrentStep((prevStep) => prevStep - 1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ numberOfDebts: studentData.number_of_debts || '', certificateDate: studentData.certificate_of_curriculum_completion || '', recordBookSubmitted: studentData.record_book_submitted ? 'да' : 'нет', diplomaWithHonors: studentData.diploma_with_honors ? 'да' : 'нет', publicationAgree: generating_info.publication_agree ? 'да' : 'нет', teacherReview: generating_info.teacher_review || '0', review: generating_info.review || '0', implementationAct: generating_info.implementation_act || 'нет', plagarismReport: generating_info.plagarism_report || 0, applicationForVacation: studentData.application_for_postgraduate_leave || 'нет', recommendedForAdmission: studentData.recommended_for_admission || 'нет', typeOfFqw: generating_info.type_of_fqw || 'академическое', additionalInformation: generating_info.additional_information || '', fqwByApplication: generating_info.theme.fqw_by_application || 'предприятия', fqwInEnglish: generating_info.fqw_in_english || 'нет', fqwRecommended: generating_info.fqw_recommended || 'к внедрению', specialConditions: generating_info.special_conditions || 'не требуется', }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleRadioChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value === 'да' })); }; return (

Форма

)} {currentStep === 1 && (

)} ); }; export default MarksCompletionForm;
